thread.title: DeFacto Global to Sponsor Premier Computing User Group Conference
thread.title_full: DeFacto Global to Sponsor Premier Computing User Group Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DeFacto Global to Sponsor Premier Computing User Group Conference
text:
Uers will see innovative features that make the latest release of deFacto Planning, version 4.0, the next-generation corporate planning platform.
Ridgefield, CT
deFacto Global is pleased to announce our participation at the Premier Computing User Conference as a sponsor. This year’s annual event, which provides a rich schedule of learning sessions for Microsoft Dynamics users, will be held September 1-2 in Sandy, Utah.
The Premier Computing User Conference for years has been offering Microsoft Dynamics users the unique opportunity to engage with fellow users in an educational environment that includes well-rounded session topics and access to peer-to-peer networking. deFacto is eager to contribute to the success of this user community during this year’s upcoming event.
Hosted by Premier Computing, the 2015 Premier Computing User Conference will offer attendees a comprehensive series of courses comprised of more than 50 learning sessions. Session titles and descriptions are available online for review at http://www.premiercomputing.com/puc2015 .
This year’s keynote speaker is Bryan Thayer, well known for his overwhelming passion for helping people achieve their business potential. In addition, Microsoft expert Daren Stegelmeier will provide the latest information on Microsoft Dynamics.
“The Premier Computing User Conference is an exemplary user event among the Microsoft Dynamics community,” said Bob Bedard, deFacto CEO. “We are excited to show Premier Computing clients the innovative features that make the latest release of deFacto Planning, version 4.0, the next-generation corporate planning platform.”
About deFacto Global
deFacto Global is a U.S.-based Microsoft-centric software company formed by experts who over the past three decades have built and implemented corporate budgeting, planning and reporting products for thousands of customers. Our mission is to enable businesses of all sizes to achieve stellar operational and financial performance. Our product, deFacto Planning, offers enterprise-quality capabilities to automate, streamline, and optimize management, analysis, and reporting of data in the most timely and effective manner for the purpose of making better business decisions. We serve customers throughout the world, ranging from middle-market to large global corporations, helping them with their business performance management. For more information, please contact Sales@deFactoGlobal.com or visit http://www.deFactoGlobal.com . Follow deFacto on Twitter @deFactoCPM.
